greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, T(0,0) = 1; n-th row = (n+1) terms of n, n+1, n+2...
comment: Apart from the irregular choice of T(0,0) the same as A051162. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 28 2012
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 100 rows, flattened
example: First few rows of the triangle are:
program: (PARI) concat([1], for(n=1,10, for(k=0,n, print1(n+k, ", ")))) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 24 2017
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 27 2007
